Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the `android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES` javadoc for details.

To get local formatting use `getDateInstance()`, `getDateTimeInstance()`, or `getTimeInstance()`, or use `new SimpleDateFormat(String template, Locale locale)` with for example `Locale.US` for ASCII dates.

The WIFI_SERVICE must be looked up on the Application context or memory will leak on devices < Android N. Try changing `ButterApplication.getAppContext()` to `ButterApplication.getAppContext().getApplicationContext()`

issue.errorLine1: <string name="wrong_abi">Oi! Du bruker feil versjon av Butter for Android. Den riktige versjonen lastes ned nå hvis det er mulig. Hvis installasjonsprogrammet ikke starter i løpet av et minutt er ikke enheten støttet, eller så er forbindelsen til internett brutt og det betyr at du bør prøve igjen senere. Hvis installasjonen feiler må du installere den riktige versjonen manuelt.</string>

Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `DiscoveryManager` which has field `context` pointing to `Context`); this is a memory leak (and also breaks Instant Run)

Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `Foreground` which has field `current` pointing to `Activity`); this is a memory leak (and also breaks Instant Run)

issue.errorLine1: <string name="wrong_abi">Uhoh! You\'re using the wrong version of Butter for Android. The right version is being downloaded right now, if possible. If the installer fails then you must install the right version manually.</string>
